A

App - demolition中的类
 
App() - 类 的构造器demolition.App
Constructor for a app Responsible for loading the configuration at the beginning of the game.

B

beKilled - 类 中的变量demolition.Enemies
The survival status of the enemy, if the value is true, the enemy is killed.
beKilled(App) - 类 中的方法demolition.Enemies
This method is used to determine whether the enemy is within the explosive range of the bomb If it is, the enemy is killed (removed from the enemy list)
beKilled - 类 中的变量demolition.Guy
This value judges whether this guy is killed or not, if it is killed, the value is true, and the default is false

The Basic attributes (whether bombguy can move)
canMove - 类 中的变量demolition.Enemies
Whether the enemy can move (whole), the default is true
canMove - 类 中的变量demolition.Guy
Whether this guy can move, the default is true
canMove(App) - 类 中的方法demolition.Guy
This method judges whether the guy can move based on the guy's current position and the expected next position If there is an obstruction, canMove is false, and the default is true

Whether the enemy can move (down), the default is true

The Basic attributes (Timer)

This method creates a red enemy instance based on the data in the red enemy list
createEnemiesYELLOW(App) - 类 中的方法demolition.LoadConfig
This method creates a red enemy instance based on the data in the yellow enemy list

D

demolition - 程序包 demolition
 
direction(App) - 类 中的方法demolition.BombGuy
This method is used to determine the current image of bombGuy At the same time restrict the bomber's re-movement
direction(App) - 类 中的方法demolition.Enemies
This method sets the enemy's image displayed in the app according to the enemy's current facing state The default facing is downward
direction(App) - 类 中的方法demolition.Guy
This method is used for the guy to change accordingly as each frame advances (Used for guy's facing) The changes will be displayed in the app's window
direction(App) - 类 中的方法demolition.RedEnemies
This method sets the red enemy's image displayed in the app according to this red enemy's current facing state The default facing is downward
direction(App) - 类 中的方法demolition.YellowEnemies
This method sets the yellow enemy's image displayed in the app according to this yellow enemy's current facing state The default facing is downward

draw() - 类 中的方法demolition.App
Call this method every frame to draw in the window
draw(App, PImage) - 类 中的方法demolition.Bomb
This method is used to draw the image when the bomb explodes in the window of the app At the same time, the explosion range and the images caused by them (if blocked by a solid wall or destroyed by a broken wall) will be drawn at the same time.
draw(App, PImage) - 类 中的方法demolition.Guy
This method is used to draw the guy's image in the app window
drawAll(App) - 类 中的方法demolition.LoadConfig
This method draws all the basic information obtained from the current level (including bombGuy, enemies, bombs, maps, etc.)
drawBomb(App) - 类 中的方法demolition.Bomb
This method is used to draw the image of the bomb (before the explosion) in the window of the app There is a timer to calculate the period of bomb image loading
drawGuy(App) - 类 中的方法demolition.Guy
This method is used to determine the image that the guy should display according to the current time The image will be periodically changed according to a specific display cycle
drawMap(ArrayList<String>, App) - 类 中的方法demolition.LoadConfig
This method is used to Draw the map according to the mapList
drawOnApp(App) - 类 中的方法demolition.LoadConfig
This method is used to draw in the draw method of the app including the loading level and drawing basic information of the image
drawScreen(boolean, App) - 类 中的方法demolition.LoadConfig
This method is used to Draw the Win or the Game Over Screen
drawUI(App, int) - 类 中的方法demolition.LoadConfig
This method is used to Draw the two main UI elements

G

gameOver - 类 中的变量demolition.LoadConfig
Used to judge whether the game is over, the default is false.
gameOver(App) - 类 中的方法demolition.LoadConfig
This method is used to determine whether the game has reached the condition of failure When the life of bombGuy is equal to 0 or the time is equal to 0, the game fails
gameWin - 类 中的变量demolition.LoadConfig
Used to judge whether the game is won, the default is false.

This method is used to return the x value of the current position of the bomb
getX() - 类 中的方法demolition.Guy
This method is used to return the x value of the current position of this guy
getY() - 类 中的方法demolition.Bomb
This method is used to return the y value of the current position of the bomb
getY() - 类 中的方法demolition.Guy
This method is used to return the y value of the current position of this guy

H

haveWall(App) - 类 中的方法demolition.Bomb
This method is used to determine whether there is a solid wall or a Broken Wall in the explosion range of the bomb If there is a solid wall, part of the image at the time of the explosion will not be displayed If there is a broken wall, destroy it (Add it to the list of storage to be destroyed)
HEIGHT - 类 中的静态变量demolition.App
The Basic attributes (Window size - height)

K

Move according to the button pressed

This method applies the press button value to the action aspect of bombGuy
keyReleased() - 类 中的方法demolition.App
This method is used to determine whether the button has been released after being pressed
killBombGuy(App) - 类 中的方法demolition.Enemies
This method is used to determine whether the enemy has collided with BombGuy (that is, at the same position as BombGuy) If so, the enemy will kill bombGuy (bombGuy loses one life)

The Basic Class (Used to load the app)
LoadConfig - demolition中的类
 
LoadConfig() - 类 的构造器demolition.LoadConfig
Constructor for the LoadConfig class
loadConfig(String) - 类 中的方法demolition.LoadConfig
This method is used to Load the information of the config file It will store the data read in the config file in the corresponding list
loadGameWin(App) - 类 中的方法demolition.LoadConfig
This method is used to determine whether the game has reached the victory conditions If it reaches, draw the victory image in the app window
loadGoalTile(App) - 类 中的方法demolition.LoadConfig
This method loads the location of the goal tile according to the map information And add its index (position) to the goal tile list
loadLevel1(App) - 类 中的方法demolition.LoadConfig
This method is used to load level1 (including the initial time of the game) or reset level1
loadLevel2(App) - 类 中的方法demolition.LoadConfig
This method is used to load level2 (when bombGuy reaches the second level) or reset level2
loadLocation(App) - 类 中的方法demolition.Bomb
This method loads the position of the explosion range according to the position of the bomb (including X and Y values) The x and y values of the explosion range will be stored in their respective lists The list of stored x values will be combined with the list of stored y values
loadMap(String, HashMap<String, String>) - 类 中的方法demolition.LoadConfig
This method is used to Load the map according to the config file path It will store the information of the map into a list
loadSolidWall(App) - 类 中的方法demolition.LoadConfig
This method loads the location of the solid wall according to the map information And add its index (position) to the solid wall list
locationBombGuy(ArrayList<String>, BombGuy) - 类 中的方法demolition.LoadConfig
This method is used to Find the location of the bombGuy
locationX - 类 中的变量demolition.Bomb
Used to store the location of the bomb explosion range (X value)
locationY - 类 中的变量demolition.Bomb
Used to store the location of the bomb explosion range (Y value)
loseLives - 类 中的变量demolition.LoadConfig
When bombGuy is killed, the value will become true, the default is false

R

rangeExplosion(App) - 类 中的方法demolition.Bomb
This method determines the scope of the explosion (data provided by a list storing X and Y values) Within a certain period of time, the bomb will explode and will destroy the Broken Wall (if there is a broken wall) When an explosion occurs, if bombGuy is within the explosion range, it will lose one life
reachGoal(App) - 类 中的方法demolition.BombGuy
This method is used to detect whether bombGuy has reached the target If it reaches, load to the next level or declare the game victory according to the situation

removeEnemy(App) - 类 中的方法demolition.RedEnemies
This method performs the corresponding operation according to the death state of the red enemy If its death status is true, remove it from the list of red enemies
removeEnemy(App) - 类 中的方法demolition.YellowEnemies
This method performs the corresponding operation according to the death state of the yellow enemy If its death status is true, remove it from the list of yellow enemies

start - 类 中的变量demolition.App
The Basic attributes (The game starts)

T

tick(App) - 类 中的方法demolition.BombGuy
This method is used to determine the movement of bombGuy in each frame, and move according to the button pressed At the same time, judge whether bombGuy can move
tick(App) - 类 中的方法demolition.Enemies
This method is used for enemies to move over time Different types of enemies have different movement patterns Only when it is determined that the enemy can move (that is, there are no obstacles)
tick(App) - 类 中的方法demolition.Guy
This method is used for the guy to change accordingly as each frame advances (Used for guy's move) The changes will be displayed in the app's window
time - 类 中的变量demolition.LoadConfig
Used to calculate time
top1Wall - 类 中的变量demolition.Bomb
Used to determine whether there is a solid wall at the top two units where the bomb is located, the default is false
top1Y - 类 中的变量demolition.Bomb
The top position of the two units from the bomb's location (Y value)
top2Wall - 类 中的变量demolition.Bomb
Used to determine whether there is a solid wall at the top one units where the bomb is located, the default is false
top2Y - 类 中的变量demolition.Bomb
The top position of the one units from the bomb's location (Y value)
topBrokenWall - 类 中的变量demolition.Bomb
Used to determine whether there is a Broken wall at the top of the bomb's location, the default is false
turnDirection() - 类 中的方法demolition.RedEnemies
This method is used to adjust the moving direction of the red enemy when encountering a blocker Red enemies will turn randomly when encountering obstacles
turnDirection() - 类 中的方法demolition.YellowEnemies
This method is used to adjust the moving direction of the yellow enemy when encountering a blocker Yellow enemies will turn clockwise when encountering obstacles
